arStrings.szText: If {c_important}Arc Lash's{/c} initial swipe Critically Strikes, it swipes an additional time.

Arc Lash grants {c_number}[{SF_19}]{/c} Mana if your swipe hits at least one enemy. When you hit {c_number}[{SF_17}]{/c} or more enemies or a Boss, your next swipe also deals  {c_number}[{SF_18}*100|%x|]{/c} more damage.
Hitting a Stunned enemy with {c_important}Arc Lash{/c} reduces your Cooldowns by {c_number}[{SF_13}|2|]{/c} seconds.
